value.title: DAX Fridays 158: PRODUCTX - Growth rate calculations
value.excerpt: Did you made a good investment last year? Do you know how to calculate that using DAX? In this video I will show you how to calculate compound growth or investment grown using PRODUCTX.   Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center  SUBSCRIBE to learn more about Power

value.title: DAX Fridays #159: GEOMEAN vs AVERAGE vs MEDIAN - Calculate compounded annual growth rate
value.excerpt: Let's calculate the compounded annual growth rate from the example we did last week and while we are at it, go through the difference between average, median and geomean.  Vid from last week: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jIb--ImdjNg  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center

value.title: DAX Fridays #16: DATEADD
value.excerpt: DATEADD is a really useful function to create sets of dates backwords or forward from a point in time. It is used for Previous date calculations. In this video, I show you how it works.  Link to DAX Studio: https://daxstudio.codeplex.com/  Link to YTD video and Power BI file: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5WGOTsYngCI

value.title: DAX Fridays! #163: Best practices when using error functions in DAX
value.excerpt: Sometimes you have to use iferror or iserror functions when writing DAX measures, but that is often not a good practice. In today's video I will tell you why and what you can do to avoid them as much as possible.  Get Northwind Dataset: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=k3NMIlLffrU  Link to DAX Fridays

value.title: DAX Fridays! #166: Compare spread after the first 100 cases | Recreating the Financial Times Graph
value.excerpt: In todays video I will show you how to recreate the financial times graph in power bi where they compare the spread of confirmed cases after the countries hit their first 100 cases.  We will do the calculation using DAX and will plot the graph in Power BI.  Link to FT article: https://www.ft.com/content/a26fbf7e-48f8-11ea-aeb3-955839e06441

value.title: DAX Fridays! #168: COALESCE function a.k.a koala function ;)
value.excerpt: In todays video I will review the COALESCE function a.k.a koala function and show you some cases where this function is useful.  I also answer Question 2 of the Microsoft Power BI exam  and ask question 3. Happy Friday!  Link to sqlserver tutorial: https://www.sqlservertutorial.net/sql-server-basics/sql-server-coalesce/

value.title: DAX FRIDAYS! #178 : My age calculations in DAX and Power Query are wrong!! How do I do it?
value.excerpt: Calculating age is harder that you think, both in power query and dax.  In today's video, I am going to show you two ways to do it with DAX  and power query that get the closest to the actual age.  Do you know any other method to calculate age? Share it in the comments!
